overview.en: With a fixed supply of 100 million, CLX token equals to the unique ownership of Coin Link X Community, the world's first token ecological community based on the blockchain thinking, aiming to provide the best ecological close-loop solutions for the global high-quality blockchain projects, and offer professional and comprehensive one-stop service to the global blockchain users.
overview.zh: CLX 是 Coin Link X 生态社区旗下唯一的所有权凭证，全球限量发行1亿个，永不增发。Coin Link X 是全球首家基于区块链思维打造的通证经济生态社区，旨在为全球优质区块链项目提供生态闭环的最佳解决方案，为全球基层区块链用户提供专业且全面的一站式服务。
